alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of gusty showers will impact portions of western Nicholas, southeastern Kanawha, southwestern Braxton, Clay and western Fayette Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers from Strange Creek southwest to Leewood, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Summersville, Fayetteville, Clay, Oak Hill, Montgomery, Ansted, Smithers, Gauley Bridge, Powellton, Hawks Nest State Park, Birch River, Burnwell, Harrison, Handley, Thurmond, Muddlety, Swiss, Indore, Eskdale and Drennan. This includes the following highways... West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 59 and 76. Route 19 between mile markers 8 and 28, and between mile markers 46 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Braxton; Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas
